item.title: Megan add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Not one of your pertinent ancestors was squashed, devoured, drowned, starved, stranded, stuck fast, untimely wounded, or otherwise deflected from its life's quest of delivering a tiny charge of genetic material to the right partner at the right moment in order to perpetuate the only possible sequence of hereditary combinations that could result -- eventually, astoundingly, and all too briefly -- in you." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Anna Dewdney
item.description: "No more of this llama drama!" -- Anna Dewdney

item.title: Megan add a quote by Jennifer Chiaverini
item.description: "One can never had too many librarian friends." -- Jennifer Chiaverini

item.title: Megan add a quote by Nicholson Baker
item.description: "I woke up thinking a very pleasant thought. There is lots left in the world to read." -- Nicholson Baker

item.title: Megan add a quote by Kate DiCamillo
item.description: "Open your heart. Someone will come. Someone will come for you. But first you must open your heart." -- Kate DiCamillo
